def_cn: 善于掌控局势的;指挥若定的
def_en: If you describe a man as masterful, you approve of him because he behaves in a way which shows that he is in control of a situation and can tell other people what to do.

def_cn: 巧妙的;熟练的;精彩的;精湛的
def_en: If you describe someone's behaviour or actions as masterful, you mean that they show great skill.
